title: Part 1: What is a meaningful life? — Nihilism and Family
description:
I received a question recently: "Can I only have a meaningful life if I am making someone else's life better?" This, of course, quickly turns into the question: "What is a meaningful life?" I would say that this question sums up all of the intellectual inquiry. This is part 1 of a multiple part series on this question. 

This is episode 2 of my podcast. 

Check out my Podcast: Finding Ideas | The Colton Kirby Show

Make Sure to Like and Subscribe!

--Links--
My Website: https://www.coltonkirby.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/_coltonkirby
Parler: https://parler.com/profile/coltonkirby/posts
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/coltonjkirby/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/_coltonkirby/
Pintrest: https://www.pinterest.com/coltonjkirby/
Quora: https://www.quora.com/profile/Colton-Kirby-7
